name: The Saint: Abyss of Despair
description: Solve a horrifying supernatural mystery and save the life of an innocent child!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: 700
